Business description
The particular highlights of the business are: - A well established business. - Good loyal clientele. - Fully equipped business with favorable lease terms (see below). - Turnover in excess of £208,000 pa with a net profit of £30,000. (See financial summary below). This is very impressive considering the credit crunch. - A business with great potential which has not been exploited because the owner wishes to emigrate. . - An easily run operation. - Good loyal well trained staff. - A good first time buyers business and an ideal purchase for a husband and wife team or family. - Very low overheads. - Business enjoys superb local reputation. - This concern provides authentic Asian curries, Indian&Pakistani delicacies as well as burgers and chips,
History Phoenix Business Transfer Agents are delighted to place onto the market this thriving well run cultured Pakistani Restaurant and Takeaway which has been established since2006. The business has been in the hands of the current owners since 2006 and they now wish to sell due to wanting to emigrate.
Services This very good business opportunity provides authentic Asian curries, Indian&Pakistani delicacies as well as burgers and chips,
Staffing The concern employs 2 full time and 1 part time staff. They are paid at the rate of £6.00 per hour. The total wage bill is £39,000. There is also a manager who is paid £12,000. All staff would stay on after a sale.
Owners Role The owners’ role is managing and working in the concern.
Marketing The owner’s do not market the business however there is a website.
Competition As far as competition is concerned various other fast food outlets are nearby.
Market The client base consists of locals, tourists and business people.
Opportunities The concern has huge potential. In particular the turnover and profits can be increased by: • Increasing the marketing activity with direct mailings and local and internet advertising. • Increasing the opening hours to include early mornings. • Becoming more efficient with staffing levels. • With an enhanced website.
Training and Handover The owner would be available for an extensive training and handover period for the benefit of the new owners if required. The Owner would also be happy for an on the job observation period to assess the business prior to offers being made.
Property information Location: - Situated in Broadway area of Wimbledon in London. - Prominent location on main arterial road. - Part of a parade of shops. - Excellent parking facilities nearby. - Industrial estates nearby. - Area earmarked for regeneration. - Surrounded by densely populated residential area with schools and other local amenities. - Local population consists of tourists, local community and business persons. - Area offers exceptional lifestyle. - Very good tourist trade. - High levels of passing trade. - Good volumes of traffic and pedestrian flow. - Commercially thriving area. - Well linked with A24, A219 and good railway links Premises details: The property is terraced and is part of a parade of shops and is approximately 120ft x 18 ft. The front is branded with an attractive glass front. The main customer service area is tiled and can seat up to 24 people. It is very well presented and is very conveniently laid out.
The restaurant/takeaway has 24 covers. The customer service point is to the front. There is an overhead menu. There are customer toilets.
To the rear is a store room, toilet, staff facilities and a fully equipped kitchen
Business Operation Expansion potential: The concern has huge potential. In particular the turnover and profits can be increased by: • Increasing the marketing activity with direct mailings and local and internet advertising. • Increasing the opening hours to include early mornings. • Becoming more efficient with staffing levels. • With an enhanced website Competition / Market: As far as competition is concerned various other fast food outlets are nearby Reasons for selling: Emigration Trading hours: Sunday to Wednesday – 12 noon - 12 midnight Thursday – 12 noon - 01.00am Friday and Saturday – 12 noon - 03.00am Employees: The concern employs 2 full time and 1 part time staff. They are paid at the rate of £6.00 per hour. The total wage bill is £39,000. There is also a manager who is paid £12,000. All staff would stay on after a sale Years established: 6 years Other information Support&training: The owner would be available for an extensive training and handover period for the benefit of the new owners if required. The Owner would also be happy for an on the job observation period to assess the business prior to offers being made. Furniture / Fixtures value: £10,000 (included in the asking price) Inventory / Stock value: £1,000
